org_midgardproject_projectsite_download.name: debian
org_midgardproject_projectsite_download.title: Debian
org_midgardproject_projectsite_download.content: <p>On Debian Squeeze, add the following to your <i>/etc/apt/sources.list</i>:</p><pre>deb http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/midgardproject:/ragnaroek/Debian_6.0/ ./<br class="GENTICS_ephemera" /></pre><p>On Debian Lenny, add the following to your <i>/etc/apt/sources.list</i>:</p><pre>deb http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/midgardproject:/ragnaroek/Debian_5.0/ ./<br class="GENTICS_ephemera" /></pre><p>Then just install Midgard1 via <i>apt-get update</i> and <i>apt-get install midgard-data</i></p>
